title: Clerk of the Superior Court in Maricopa County: Delivering fast, accurate answers to the public
excerpt: The Clerk of the Superior Court in Maricopa County, based out of Phoenix, Arizona, receives thousands of service requests each day from its 4 million residents. Citizens often reach out with time-sensitive requests, like applying for marriage licenses, renewing passports and accessing court records.
